scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:functions && webpack --mode production
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && npm run build:functions && webpack --mode development
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && npm run build:functions && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js --mode production --env production
scripts.build:staging: npm run prebuild && npm run build:functions && webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js --mode production --env staging
scripts.prebuild: node -e "console.log('Checking dependencies...'); try { require.resolve('typescript'); require.resolve('custom-functions-metadata'); console.log('✅ All build dependencies found'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ Missing build dependencies. Please run: npm install'); console.error('Error:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.analyze:build: npm run build && npm run analyze
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:staging
scripts.deploy:prepare:prod: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:prod
